briefdescription.para: The number of patches to crop per glimpse.

briefdescription.para: The glimpse layer returns a retina-like representation (down-scaled cropped images) of increasing scale around a given location in a given image.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the input data (arma::colvec, arma::mat, arma::sp_mat or arma::cube).
Type of the output data (arma::colvec, arma::mat, arma::sp_mat or arma::cube).
